snippet.title: Amber Heard and Elon Musk avoid one another at Oscar party in LA
snippet.description: Amber Heard and Elon Musk almost bumped into each other outside of Chateau Marmont in West Hollywood on Sunday night.The on-again off-again pair, who split in February, arrived separately to the Oscar party, but were each accompanied by a guest.This was the second time that the former couple had to avoid each other over the weekend as they were both spotted at the Oscar WME party in Beverly Hills on Friday night.   Abort! Exes Amber Heard, 31, and Elon Musk,46, almost bumped into each other outside of Chateau Marmont in West Hollywood on Sunday nightHeard, 31, arrived at Chateau Marmont in tantalizing see through outfit. The petite ex-wife of Johnny Depp flaunted her hot bod in a black strapless bodysuit that was underneath a mesh dress that flowed all the way to the floor.     RELATED ARTICLES  Previous   1   Next   Take two - the after-party! Stars switch gowns and let their...  Make-up free Donna Air cuts a casual figure as she hits the...  Amber Tamblyn and her one-year-old daughter are 'shaken'...  'Sundays are for lazing about in your underwear': Love...  Share this article   Share   220 shares   She was accompanied by friend and author iO Tillett Wright.    Back in the game! Elon arrived to the Oscar party with a mystery woman who was very under dressed for the occasion    Girl time! Amber was all smiles as she arrived with friend and author iO Tillett WrightMusk's mystery date must not have gotten the black tie memo as she showed up to the party in a pair of leather shorts and a black bomber jacket. On the other hand, the SpaceX founder, 46, looked handsome in his black suit and a crisp white collared shirt. Elon left his tie at home unlike many of the other men.    Single again! Heard and Musk recently split for the second time in February 2017 Amber and Elon were last spotted together in January on a romantic sushi date in Los Angeles.The couple first went public with their romance back in April 2017 and seemed blissfully happy together before breaking up in August 2017.    Musk made a public statement on Instagram post break up that left many thinking their feeling for each other hadn't completely dissolved.  'Although Amber and I did break up, we are still friends, remain close and love one another,' he said.  The two would later rekindle their romance in December 2017 only to split again two months later.   Old flames! Amber initially went public with their romance in April 2017 when she shared a picture on Instagram of the pair at dinner
